00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename T, precision P>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> rgbColor(const detail::tvec3<T, P>& hsvColor)
00014         {
00015                 detail::tvec3<T, P> hsv = hsvColor;
00016                 detail::tvec3<T, P> rgbColor;
00017 
00018                 if(hsv.y == static_cast<T>(0))
00019                         // achromatic (grey)
00020                         rgbColor = detail::tvec3<T, P>(hsv.z);
00021                 else
00022                 {
00023                         T sector = floor(hsv.x / T(60));
00024                         T frac = (hsv.x / T(60)) - sector;
00025                         // factorial part of h
00026                         T o = hsv.z * (T(1) - hsv.y);
00027                         T p = hsv.z * (T(1) - hsv.y * frac);
00028                         T q = hsv.z * (T(1) - hsv.y * (T(1) - frac));
00029 
00030                         switch(int(sector))
00031                         {
00032                         default:
00033                         case 0:
00034                                 rgbColor.r = hsv.z;
00035                                 rgbColor.g = q;
00036                                 rgbColor.b = o;
00037                                 break;
00038                         case 1:
00039                                 rgbColor.r = p;
00040                                 rgbColor.g = hsv.z;
00041                                 rgbColor.b = o;
00042                                 break;
00043                         case 2:
00044                                 rgbColor.r = o;
00045                                 rgbColor.g = hsv.z;
00046                                 rgbColor.b = q;
00047                                 break;
00048                         case 3:
00049                                 rgbColor.r = o;
00050                                 rgbColor.g = p;
00051                                 rgbColor.b = hsv.z;
00052                                 break;
00053                         case 4:
00054                                 rgbColor.r = q; 
00055                                 rgbColor.g = o; 
00056                                 rgbColor.b = hsv.z;
00057                                 break;
00058                         case 5:
00059                                 rgbColor.r = hsv.z; 
00060                                 rgbColor.g = o; 
00061                                 rgbColor.b = p;
00062                                 break;
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065 
00066                 return rgbColor;
00067         }
00068 
00069         template <typename T, precision P>
00070         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> hsvColor(const detail::tvec3<T, P>& rgbColor)
00071         {
00072                 detail::tvec3<T, P> hsv = rgbColor;
00073                 float Min   = min(min(rgbColor.r, rgbColor.g), rgbColor.b);
00074                 float Max   = max(max(rgbColor.r, rgbColor.g), rgbColor.b);
00075                 float Delta = Max - Min;
00076 
00077                 hsv.z = Max;                               
00078 
00079                 if(Max != static_cast<T>(0))
00080                 {
00081                         hsv.y = Delta / hsv.z;    
00082                         T h = static_cast<T>(0);
00083 
00084                         if(rgbColor.r == Max)
00085                                 // between yellow & magenta
00086                                 h = static_cast<T>(0) + T(60) * (rgbColor.g - rgbColor.b) / Delta;
00087                         else if(rgbColor.g == Max)
00088                                 // between cyan & yellow
00089                                 h = static_cast<T>(120) + T(60) * (rgbColor.b - rgbColor.r) / Delta;
00090                         else
00091                                 // between magenta & cyan
00092                                 h = static_cast<T>(240) + T(60) * (rgbColor.r - rgbColor.g) / Delta;
00093 
00094                         if(h < T(0)) 
00095                                 hsv.x = h + T(360);
00096                         else
00097                                 hsv.x = h;
00098                 }
00099                 else
00100                 {
00101                         // If r = g = b = 0 then s = 0, h is undefined
00102                         hsv.y = static_cast<T>(0);
00103                         hsv.x = static_cast<T>(0);
00104                 }
00105 
00106                 return hsv;
00107         }
00108 
00109         template <typename T>
00110         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> saturation(T const s)
00111         {
00112                 detail::tvec3<T, defaultp> rgbw = detail::tvec3<T, defaultp>(T(0.2126), T(0.7152), T(0.0722));
00113 
00114                 T col0 = (T(1) - s) * rgbw.r;
00115                 T col1 = (T(1) - s) * rgbw.g;
00116                 T col2 = (T(1) - s) * rgbw.b;
00117 
00118                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> result(T(1));
00119                 result[0][0] = col0 + s;
00120                 result[0][1] = col0;
00121                 result[0][2] = col0;
00122                 result[1][0] = col1;
00123                 result[1][1] = col1 + s;
00124                 result[1][2] = col1;
00125                 result[2][0] = col2;
00126                 result[2][1] = col2;
00127                 result[2][2] = col2 + s;
00128                 return result;
00129         }
00130 
00131         template <typename T, precision P>
00132         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> saturation(const T s, const detail::tvec3<T, P>& color)
00133         {
00134                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(saturation(s) * detail::tvec4<T, P>(color, T(0)));
00135         }
00136 
00137         template <typename T, precision P>
00138         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, P> saturation(const T s, const detail::tvec4<T, P>& color)
00139         {
00140                 return saturation(s) * color;
00141         }
00142 
00143         template <typename T, precision P> 
00144         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T luminosity(const detail::tvec3<T, P>& color)
00145         {
00146                 const detail::tvec3<T, P> tmp = detail::tvec3<T, P>(0.33, 0.59, 0.11);
00147                 return dot(color, tmp);
00148         }
00149 }//namespace glm
